parameters.name: Parameter
parameters.description: Default parameter as defined in swSheetMetalOverrideDefaultParameters_e

parameters.name: OverrideDefaultParameter
parameters.description: True to override Parameter, false to not

title: ISheetMetalFeatureData.SetOverrideDefaultParameter2
description: Sets whether to override the specified default parameter in this sheet metal feature in a multibody sheet metal part.
signature:
System.Int32 SetOverrideDefaultParameter2( 
   System.Int32
Parameter
,
   System.Boolean
OverrideDefaultParameter
)

parameters.name: Parameter
parameters.description: Default parameter as defined in swSheetMetalOverrideDefaultParameters_e

parameters.name: OverrideDefaultParameter
parameters.description: True to override Parameter, false to not

returns: Result code as defined in swSheetMetalModifierError_e
remarks: This property is only valid for multibody sheet metal parts created in SOLIDWORKS 2013 and later.
